# pelican Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "pelican" {
  server = "https://game.example.com" # or via environment variable PELICAN_SERVER
  token  = "my-secret-token"          # or via environment variable PELICAN_TOKEN
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `server` (String)
- `token` (String, Sensitive)
